sarad.sari¶

Abstract class for all SARAD instruments

SaradInst comprises all attributes and methods that all SARAD instruments have in common.

Module Contents¶

Classes¶

MeasurandDict

Type declaration for Measurand dictionary.

Type declaration for instrument type dictionary.

Type declaration for Family dictionary.

Type declaration for checked reply from instrument.

Class providing a measurand that is delivered by a sensor.

Class describing a sensor that is part of a component.

Class describing a sensor or actor component built into an instrument

Basic class for the serial communication protocol of SARAD instruments

class sarad.sari.Measurand(measurand_id: int, measurand_name: str, measurand_unit=None, measurand_source=None)¶

Class providing a measurand that is delivered by a sensor.

Properties:

id name operator value unit source time gps

version :str = 0.1¶
__str__(self) → str¶

Return str(self).

property measurand_id(self) → int¶

Return the Id of this measurand.

property name(self) → str¶

Return the name of this measurand.

property unit(self) → str¶

Return the physical unit of this measurand.

property source(self) → int¶

Return the source index belonging to this measurand. This index marks the position the measurand can be found in the list of recent values provided by the instrument as reply to the GetComponentResult or _gather_all_recent_values commands respectively.

property operator(self) → str¶

Return the operator belonging to this measurand. Typical operators are ‘<’, ‘>’

property value(self) → Optional[float]¶

Return the value of the measurand.

property time(self) → datetime.datetime¶

Return the aquisition time (timestamp) of the measurand.

property gps(self) → str¶

Return the GPS string of the measurand.

Return the measuring interval of this sensor.

class sarad.sari.SaradInst(port=None, family=None)¶

Bases: Generic[SI]

Basic class for the serial communication protocol of SARAD instruments

products¶

Dictionary holding a database containing the features of all SARAD products that cannot be gained from the instrument itself.

Type

Dict

Properties:

port: String containing the serial communication port family: Device family of the instrument expected to be at this port device_id: Identifier for an individual instrument in a cluster type_id: Together with family, this Id identifys the instrument type. type_name: Identifys the instrument type. software_version: The version of the firmware. serial_number: Serial number of the connected instrument. components: List of sensor or actor components

class Lock¶

Bases: enum.Enum

Setting of the device. Lock the hardware button.

UNLOCKED :int = 1¶
LOCKED :int = 2¶
class RadonMode¶

Bases: enum.Enum

Setting of the device. Displayed radon values based on short living progeny only (fast) or on short and long living progeny (slow)

SLOW :int = 1¶
FAST :int = 2¶
class PumpMode¶

Bases: enum.Enum

Setting of the devices having a pump.

CONTINUOUS :int = 1¶
INTERVAL :int = 2¶
class Units¶

Bases: enum.Enum

Setting of the device. Unit system used for display.

SI :int = 1¶
US :int = 2¶
class Signal¶

Bases: enum.Enum

Setting of the device. When shall it give an audible signal?

OFF :int = 1¶
ALARM :int = 2¶
SNIFFER_PO216 :int = 3¶
PO216_PO218 :int = 4¶
class ChamberSize¶

Bases: enum.Enum

Setting the chamber size (Radon Scout PMT only).

MEDIUM :int = 2¶
LARGE :int = 3¶
XL :int = 4¶
version = 1.0¶
__iter__(self) → Iterator[Component]¶
__hash__(self)¶

Return hash(self).

__eq__(self, other)¶

Return self==value.

static __make_command_msg(cmd_data: List[bytes]) → bytes¶

Encode the message to be sent to the SARAD instrument. Arguments are the one byte long command and the data bytes to be sent.

static __check_answer(answer: bytes) → CheckedAnswerDict¶
get_message_payload(self, message: bytes, timeout: int) → CheckedAnswerDict¶

Send a message to the instrument and give back the payload of the reply.

Parameters

  • message – The message to send.

  • timeout – Timeout for waiting for a reply from instrument.

Returns

Dictionary of is_valid: True if answer is valid, False otherwise, is_control_message: True if control message, payload: Payload of answer, number_of_bytes_in_payload

__str__(self) → str¶

Return str(self).

_initialize(self) → None¶
_get_description(self) → bool¶

Set instrument type, software version, and serial number.

_build_component_list(self) → int¶

Build up a list of components with sensors and measurands. Will be overriden by derived classes.

static _bytes_to_float(value: bytes) → float¶

Convert 4 bytes (little endian) from serial interface into floating point nummber according to IEEE 754

static _parse_value_string(value: str) → MeasurandDict¶

Take a string containing a physical value with operator, value and unit and decompose it into its parts for further mathematical processing.

_encode_setup_word(self) → bytes¶

Compile the SetupWord for Doseman and RadonScout devices from its components. All used arguments from self are enum objects.

_decode_setup_word(self, setup_word: bytes) → None¶
_get_parameter(self, parameter_name: str) → Any¶
get_reply(self, cmd_data: List[bytes], _reply_length=50, timeout=0.1) → Any¶

Returns a bytestring of the payload of the instruments reply to the provided list of 1-byte command and data bytes.

static __get_control_bytes(serial)¶

Read 3 Bytes from serial interface

static __get_payload_length(first_bytes)¶

Read 3 Bytes from serial interface to get the length of payload from the control byte.

_get_transparent_reply(self, raw_cmd, timeout=0.1, keep=True)¶

Returns the raw bytestring of the instruments reply

start_cycle(self, cycle_index: int) → None¶

Start measurement cycle. Place holder for subclasses.

stop_cycle(self) → None¶

Stop measurement cycle. Place holder for subclasses.

set_real_time_clock(self, _: datetime.datetime) → bool¶

Set RTC of instrument to datetime. Place holder for subclasses.

property port(self) → str¶

Return serial port.

property device_id(self) → str¶

Return device id.

property family(self) → FamilyDict¶

Return the instrument family.

property type_id(self) → int¶

Return the device type id.

property type_name(self) → str¶

Return the device type name.

property software_version(self) → int¶

Return the firmware version of the device.

property serial_number(self) → int¶

Return the serial number of the device.

property components(self) → Collection[Component]¶

Return the list of components of the device.
